name: Joseph Patton
coverLetter:
Hello, my background is in sailing, but I have just recently moved back to land in search for employment.  I have always been a very positive person with a great work ethic.  I'd absolutely love to work with my hands and be proud of the quality of my work trimming.  I understand I have no experience trimming, but I am college educated, a fast learner, and have references of my previous work experience available.

I am looking for full-time work, but very open to hear about seasonal and part-time positions.  Thank you for your time, I look forward to hearing from you!
